00016 class HistogrammPT {
00017   public:
00018     struct HCell {
00019         double val;
00020         unsigned p_i;
00021         unsigned t_i;
00022     };
00023   
00024     HCell *c;
00025     unsigned c_count;
00026   
00027     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00030     class AxisRange {
00031       public:
00032         MinMaxRange<double> lim;
00033         double step;
00034         unsigned n;
00035     
00036         bool set(const MinMaxRange<double> &_lim, double _step);
00037     
00038         unsigned idx(double val){
00039           return (unsigned)((val - lim.min)/step);
00040         }
00041     };
00042 
00043     AxisRange p;
00044     AxisRange t;
00045   
00047     HistogrammPT(): c(0),c_count(0) {}
00048  
00050     virtual ~HistogrammPT() { if(c) delete[] c; }
00051   
00054     virtual bool Book(const MinMaxRange<double> &p_lim,
00055                       const MinMaxRange<double> &t_lim,
00056                       double _step=0.006);
00059     bool Fill(const Sphere3D  &sp,double e){
00060       HCell *pc = get(sp);
00061       if(!pc)
00062         return false;
00063       pc->val += e;
00064       return true;
00065     }
00066   
00069     HCell *get(const Sphere3D &sp);
00070   
00073     HCell *get_by_index(unsigned p_i, unsigned t_i){
00074       return &(c[p_i * t.n + t_i]);
00075     }
00076 
00079     double get_t(const HCell &c){
00080       return t.lim.min + t.step * (.5 + c.t_i);
00081     }
00082 
00085     double get_p(const HCell &c){
00086       return p.lim.min + p.step*(.5 + c.p_i);
00087     }
00088 };
00089 
00092 inline bool operator<(const HistogrammPT::HCell &a,
00093                       const HistogrammPT::HCell &b){
00094   return a.val < b.val;
00095 }
00098 inline bool operator>(const HistogrammPT::HCell &a,
00099                       const HistogrammPT::HCell &b){
00100   return a.val > b.val;
00101 }
